S

saveFile(Language, String) - Static method in class fileHandlingPackage.FileHandling
This method saves the given text in a text file with the name and in the directory chosen by the user
saveKey(Language, Key) - Static method in class fileHandlingPackage.FileHandling
This method create SaveDialog to save the given key object of type Key in a key File as an object it's declared static because it doesn't rely on any instance of this class so it can be accessed directly by invoking it directly from this class
setCipherText(String) - Method in class cipheringPackage.Cipher
A setter method to set the cipher text
setHomophones(ArrayList<ArrayList<String>>) - Method in class cipheringPackage.Key
A setter method to set the homophones

Method to set the Initial Position

Method to set the keyword
setKeyword(String) - Method in class cipheringPackage.Key
This method overloads the first setKeyword method and sets the keyword by passing a String parameter not any ArrayList
setLanguage(Language) - Method in class cipheringPackage.Key
Method to set the language
setPlainText(String) - Method in class cipheringPackage.Cipher

setRandomAlphabet(Language) - Method in class cipheringPackage.Key
A setter Method to create and set the Random Alphabet
showSplashScreen() - Method in class GUIPackage.SplashScreen
This method simply shows the splash screen for a while then it disappears to move to the next frame/window
